markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inner Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=5829) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 79 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[spirit instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

Your strength is part of your rage. As long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement. You reduce your [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) condition's value by 1.
name: Inner Strength
